name: UCC Mardyke Arena
body: This year the Mardyke arena has kindly agreed to let us once again host our event at their amazing facility. Situated on the bank of the river Lee, the Mardkye offers state of the art sporting and gym facilities. Check out their website for more information.

name: Milano Leotards
body: Milano offers high quality sporting attire for gymnastics and cheerleading. For over 20 years it has been a leader in the market, consistently producing beautiful and functionally designed leotards, leisure wear and accessories for all disciplines of gymnastics. They even provided the attire for the UK menâ€™s Olympic team in 2012. You can find more information about this fantastic company, and frequent supporter of ISTO on their website.

name: Gymnastics Ireland
body: Gymnastics is one of the most popular sports in Ireland, supported by the work of our national governing body, Gymnastics Ireland. We would like to thank Gymnastics Ireland for supporting the growth in popularity of trampolining as a sport in Ireland.

name: Eurotramp
body: Eurotramp is a worldwide leading company specialized on building trampolines with more than 50 years of experience. We produce high quality products for professional competitions as well as leisure time and outdoor products. Our high quality standard as well as the ambition to innovation, best possible customer relationship and excellent reliability are mirroring in every single Eurotramp trampoline. Not for nothing top athletes all over the world do trust in our trampolines and our service every single day.
